scripts.build: npm rebuild node-sass && yarn lint && yarn test:once && yarn build-css && react-scripts build
scripts.lint-all: npm run lint && npm run sass-lint
scripts.test:once: npm rebuild node-sass && yarn build-css && CI=true react-scripts test src/**/* --env=jsdom
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
